categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Macerus was a Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Darth Macerus was intended to appear in Patch 1.3.0 of Star Wars: The Old Republic, but was ultimately cut. The character exists within the game files with a placeholder model.
